cause.description:
More than 7,500,000 women have been infected with HIV since July 2003. HIV has no found cure and these women have been guarenteed a slow death. HIV/AIDS is spreaded through sex and blood, and more than 40,000,000 people are infected with the disease, 95% are in developing countries. AIDS is the number one killer in this continent. All guarenteed death, and 70% are adults.
By 2010, 40,000,000 children in Africa will be orphaned due to AIDS. 45% of people live in poverty, this will be increased to 60% in the next 10 years due to AIDS. Zambia has lost 1,300 teachers due to AIDS in the first ten months of 1998, the equivalent of two- thirds of all new teachers trained annually.
You can help us by donating or spreading the word. Together we can fight AIDS in hope for a better world.
1. More research on a cure for HIV/AIDS
2. Schools in Africa must promote safer sex
cause.mission: Find a cure for HIV/AIDS and bring rise to safer sex
cause.name: Research For HIV/AIDS
